title: Colin Frangicetto from Circa Survive
itunes:title: Colin Frangicetto from Circa Survive
description:
We have Colin from Circa Survive on the show this week! He plays guitar for the band and is also an incredibly talented artist and I've known him for over 10 years so he made it real easy for me to want him as a guest. We get in deep with discussions about his first bands, expanding your mind and pushing creative boundaries. It's a deep and engaging discussion that I enjoyed, so I know you will as well.- - - -This weeks show is brought to you by Title Fight and their full length, Hyperview in stores and online now!This weeks show is also brought to you by Loot Crate and their amazing pop culture subscription box, sign up now and receive $3 off your first box.Our final sponsor is Audible, the world's leading audiobook and program provider. For a FREE 30 day trial, sign up now!Follow the show on Twitter

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
